description:
Total grid of height-depth data from the Western Scheldt to produce different ground maps.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Laser altimetry data combined with singlebeam sounding data where laser alimetry data has a higher priority than the sounding data. In order to fill the entire grid, it is then supplemented with multibeam soundings and additional data in Flemish territory.
name: Topo-bathymetry (unit: m/reference plane: NAP, Western Scheldt, 2011)
